page.title: 05HOME LIFE
page.content: {A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY. The day begins at 7 a.m. when I wake up and get ready for school.I dress in my blue school uniform and then have my breakfast.I live about two miles from school and catch the school bus. School starts at 8.25 a.m. with registration.We then proceed to assembly and then to our lessons.Our lessons include History,R.E.,Crafts, Geography,Maths,English and Games.At 10.25 we have a break to buy crisps and pop in the canteen.We have a 15 minute break and then continue work until lunch at 11.45.Some people go home while others have school lunch. Lessons recommence at 12.45 until 2.55 when we go home.Sometimes we go on trips in the school bus to places of interest such as the Big Pit Mining Museum at Blaenavon. {Kathryn Milton }aged 15.
